name: Projectilemotion
0:
”Alexa, launch projectile problem and solve my problem.”
”Alexa, ask projectile problem to find the final position.”
”Alexa, launch projectile problem and find the displacement.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: projectile problem
des:
This skill interactively helps the user solve a standard projectile motion equation with constant acceleration. The skill finds the displacement of the object. It confirms the input with the user, and states the displacement.
When prompted, the user supplies the initial velocity "v0", the acceleration "a", and the time, “t”. The user may say things like "negative five point three seven one" and the skill will understand the value to be "-5.371".
This skill handles real coefficients that are not necessarily whole numbers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
